sentence.Network_en: So too might the Jovian moons Callisto and Ganymede.

sentence.Network_en: The Jovian day flashes in 10 hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 术星的一天在十小时内便转瞬即逝.

sentence.Network_en: The Jovian moons Io and Europa are about the same size as Earth's moon.
sentence.Network_cn: 木卫一和木卫二大小几乎和地球一样.
